author: Margaret Harding McGill
title: Coronavirus pandemic blunts Americans' Big Tech backlash - Axios
description: Sentiment has shifted as the virus has forced more Americans to rely on online services.
content:
Americans are looking more favorably on the tech industry and are especially cheered by efforts to help track coronavirus cases, according to recent polling.
Why it matters: The industry's image was taking a beating over concerns around misinformation, priva… [+1240 chars]
